roleset.name: make a cluster or pile

example.name: agglomerate-v: Passive, Transitive
example.text: [Poorly compressible crystals of acebutolol hydrochloride]-1were agglomerated *T*-1 by the spherical crystallization technique with a two-solvent system
example.arg: *T*-1 (= Poorly compressible crystals of acebutolol hydrochloride)
by the sphrical crystallization technique with a two-solvent system

example.name: agglomerate-v: Middle, Inransitive
example.text: Coal-1 is agglomerated *trace*-1 during coal processing in a preparation plant.

example.name: agglomeration-n
example.text: On the other hand , the geometric agglomeration of population to the cities can be hardly met by the speed of investment of resources
